TopicTitle: Overly Heavy Rockets without Launch Stability Enhancers = Instant Death to Launchpad

Articles.Content: I know this bug has shown up for others on the runway. However, I have now been affected by this bug causing instant death to the launchpad (and in the process, killing kerbals) due to the extreme high mass of the rocket. Only workaround to this is to use Launch Stability Enhancers. Otherwise, it is instant death. :|
Yes, it is a bit frustrating, but it's funny if your rocket lifts of in a fireball...
